thread.title: BRIEF-India's Sun Pharma Advanced Research Co Dec Qtr Loss Narrows

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Sun Pharma Advanced Research Co Dec Qtr Loss Narrows

organizations.name: brief-india's sun pharma advanced research co
reuters) - sun pharma advanced research company ltd

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Sun Pharma Advanced Research Company Ltd :
* DEC QUARTER LOSS 580.7 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS LOSS 660.2 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 194.2 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 230.5 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO Source text: bit.ly/2FsnZ41 Further company coverage:
